forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 48. Northwest wind 12 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
Tonight, Downtown San Francisco basks under a canopy of stars, an invigorating chill in the air as the temperature dips towards the serene low fifties. The clarity of the night sky glimmers, unmarred by fog, allowing the city’s lights to twinkle like distant constellations. A brisk northwestern wind whispers through the streets, a gentle reminder of the vigor of autumn evenings. As dawn approaches, the sun will rise to unveil a day characterized by golden sunlight and refreshing breezes, warming up to a high in the mid-fifties before the afternoon cools again. 

As you venture into the day, a well-layered outfit will serve you best—think light sweaters or long-sleeved shirts paired with wind-resistant jackets to fend off the gusts. Engaging in quiet walks along the Embarcadero or finding a cozy café to savor warm brews may be particularly satisfying given the brisk atmosphere. Enjoy the expanse of vibrant city life, confident that the weather embraces you with its cool, yet inviting presence.
